meanings.definition: A support for holding a book open while reading.
meanings.sent1: I used the bookrests to keep my book open on the table.
meanings.sent2: The bookrests on the table made it easier for me to read without holding the book.
meanings.sent3: The bookrests were like little hands helping me hold the book open.
meanings.sent4: The bookrests acted as loyal companions, keeping my book steady as I read.
meanings.sent5: The bookrests cradled the book gently, allowing me to read comfortably.

meanings.definition: Objects used to prop up books for display or storage.
meanings.sent1: I arranged the bookrests on the shelf to showcase my favorite books.
meanings.sent2: The bookrests kept the books neatly organized on the bookshelf.
meanings.sent3: The bookrests seemed to be having a party, holding up the books in style.
meanings.sent4: The bookrests stood like guardians, protecting the books from falling over.
meanings.sent5: The bookrests displayed the books proudly, adding charm to the room.
